name: Allowance on retirement for service-connected disability
text: Upon retirement for service-connected disability, a member shall receive the amount of the member's accumulated contributions and a retirement allowance which shall consist of fifty per cent of the member's average final compensation. [L 1963, c 127, §9; Supp, §6-47.1; HRS §88-70; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1998, c 151, §7]
